entry.string: You must enable cookies on your browser to run Xaraya. Check the browser configuration options to make sure cookies are enabled, click on the "Back" button of the browser and try again.
entry.translation: Anda harus mengaktifkan cookies pada browser Anda untuk menjalankan Xaraya. Cek pilihan konfigurasi browser untuk memastikan cookies telah aktif, klik pada tommbol "Back" browser dan coba lagi.

entry.string: Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: Akun Anda telah dikunci selama #(1) menit.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
entry.translation: Masalah login dalam: Username dan Password tidak sah.

entry.string: Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: Akun Anda telah dihapus berdasarkan permintaan Anda atau kebijakan administrator.

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
entry.translation: Akun Anda ditandai tidak aktif. Kontak administrator untuk informasi lebih lanjut.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
entry.translation: Masalah log-in: Username atau password tidak sah. Akun Anda dikunci selama #(1) menit.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
entry.translation: Masalah log-in: Username atau password tidak sah. Anda mencoba log-in sebanyak #(1) kali.

entry.string: Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: Akun Anda masih belum diaktifkan oleh administrator
